thread.section_title: Fiix Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fiix | fiixsoftware.com
thread.title: Paul K

author: Paul K
title: Paul K
text: Fiix (Maintenance Assistant) has a lot of features and versatility. As with any large database it takes a while to learn the full breadth of what it can do for you, and it can do a lot. The search features are helpful as it can sometimes be difficult to find entries as you add more and more things to the database. The only real significant negative is that the set up of user group permissions is extremely arduous and frankly more difficult than it needs to be.
